mapper.insert: insert into CRM_CUSTOMER_INFO (CUSTOMER_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, FULL_NAME, SHORT_NAME, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_PHONE, INNER_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMER_TYPE, ADDRESS, US_PLAT_SYSTEM, PLATFORM_ADMIN_USER, SETTLE_DAY, PRICE, USING_STATUS) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usPlatSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformAdminUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleDay,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{usingStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select CUSTOMER_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, FULL_NAME, SHORT_NAME, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_PHONE, INNER_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMER_TYPE, ADDRESS, US_PLAT_SYSTEM, PLATFORM_ADMIN_USER, SETTLE_DAY, PRICE, USING_STATUS from CRM_CUSTOMER_INFO where CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select CUSTOMER_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, FULL_NAME, SHORT_NAME, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_PHONE, INNER_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMER_TYPE, ADDRESS, US_PLAT_SYSTEM, PLATFORM_ADMIN_USER, SETTLE_DAY, PRICE, USING_STATUS from CRM_CUSTOMER_INFO

SELECT CUSTOMER_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, FULL_NAME, SHORT_NAME, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_PHONE, INNER_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMER_TYPE, ADDRESS, US_PLAT_SYSTEM, PLATFORM_ADMIN_USER, SETTLE_DAY, PRICE, USING_STATUS FROM CRM_CUSTOMER_INFO
AND CUSTOMER_ID LIKE '%' || #{filter.customerId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CREATED_BY LIKE '%' || #{filter.createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND #{filter.createdTimeBefore, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} <= CREATED_TIME
AND CREATED_TIME < #{filter.createdTimeAfter, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}
AND UPDATED_BY LIKE '%' || #{filter.updatedBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND #{filter.updatedTimeBefore, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} <= UPDATED_TIME
AND UPDATED_TIME < #{filter.updatedTimeAfter, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}
AND FULL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{filter.fullName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND SHORT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{filter.shortName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND MANAGER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{filter.managerName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND MANAGER_PHONE LIKE '%' || #{filter.managerPhone, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND INNER_CUSTOMER LIKE '%' || #{filter.innerCustomer, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CUSTOMER_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{filter.customerType, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{filter.address, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND US_PLAT_SYSTEM LIKE '%' || #{filter.usPlatSystem, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND PLATFORM_ADMIN_USER LIKE '%' || #{filter.platformAdminUser, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND SETTLE_DAY = #{filter.settleDay, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
AND PRICE = #{filter.price, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
AND USING_STATUS = #{filter.usingStatus, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
